relevance_explanation: All branches and tool calls irrelevant to this customer were correctly removed. For example the routine correctly uses the loyalty points to determine that they are a preferred customer. Also, code for non-refundable tickets and cases where insurance wasn't purchased are removed.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer are preserved. All tool calls present in this scenario are present in the routine with correctly extracted values from customer data.
